item.title: Other World - Video
item.itunes:author: Musilosophy
item.description: Two world exists: one is based on hyper-consumption, hyper-nutrition, hyper -waste or in other words 'HYPER', the biggest other one in which people literally die of thirst. Being children weaker than adults, they are unfortunately the largest victims of this bad tragedy. But having someone in a family that is not healthy, who is hungry usually makes the other member try hard to heal him or to feed him. Why then do we, inhabitants of the rich world, not really help our unluckier brother? Often it happens, but often it doesn't. Consequently many people hide to themselves this less world which needs help; actually it is unable to survive, maybe it is still untimely, maybe the 'first world' has been exploiting it for hundreds of years, perhaps for thousands, for its hyper-consumption. "...give them a piece...a small piece of your bread..."
item.itunes:subtitle: Other World - video
item.itunes:keywords: italian singer,blues,piano,improvisation,music videos,italiano,pianist,charity,febder rhodes,video podcast,pop video
